column5: Just wondering if anybody has checked the river up by Southampton lately. Got the itch for some steelies but need to know if it is frozen over or if there are some spots I can drift a float.  Any help would be appreciated.  Dan
After yesterdays rain on top of snow melt, rivers will be a ragin torrent, esp the large Northern tribs, wait till they lower and clean, and flows slow down.
Ya, I think I may hit the hard water instead.
I was gonna suggest getting a prescription cream to help with that itch.
Naw---take one small bow, rub it over the affected area. (It helps if you're bald)
